document_data.mainbody: ''Iyrytharna Dantras''' was a [[wizard]] who lived near [[Juniril]] in [[Cormyr]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Iyrytharna spent most of her time in an underground home making spells.
document_data.Relationships: She was married to a [[werepegasus]] named [[Thorn (werepegasus)|Thorn]].
